reviews.Title: Its just another iPhone...
reviews.Comment:
Coming from iPhone 12, the iPhone 15 Plus is seriously an update. However, the feel good factor of owning an iPhone wasn't that exciting as was when i owned the iPhone 12. The display size and the overall dimensions of the iPhone 15 Plus took time for me to get used to. It is seriously big for my normal palm size. Its hefty compared to 12.

Except for the island cutout instead of the infamous notch on the top, i don't see much of a difference. Yes, the battery last very long. It easily outrun...
